Package org.cesecore.certificates.certificate.certextensions.standard

Class StandardCertificateExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.certificates.certificate.certextensions.CertificateExtension
      • org.cesecore.certificates.certificate.certextensions.standard.StandardCertificateExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorityInformationAccess, AuthorityKeyIdentifier, BasicConstraint, CertificatePolicies, CrlDistributionPoints, DocumentTypeList, ExtendedKeyUsage, FreshestCrl, IssuerAltNames, KeyUsage, MsTemplate, NameConstraint, OcspNoCheck, PrivateKeyUsagePeriod, QcStatement, SeisCardNumber, SubjectAltNames, SubjectDirectoryAttributes, SubjectKeyIdentifier
    public abstract class StandardCertificateExtension
extends CertificateExtension
    Base class for a standard certificate extension. All standard extensions should inherit this class. The methods that need implementation is init frmm here and getValue from the super class. init should call setOID and setCriticalFlag from the super class. Implementing class must have a default constructor, calling super constructor.
    Version:
    $Id: StandardCertificateExtension.java 21979 2015-10-07 14:06:49Z mikekushner $
